responses.rationale: The segment describes inventory levels, not capability or preparedness.
Describes 'U.S. surveillance efforts' (a capability/measure) without explicit calming language.
Describes 'high-level biosecurity protocol has been activated' (a safeguard/measure) without explicit calming language.
Describes 'enacted new safeguards' (a capability/measure) without explicit calming language.
Describes preparedness ('fully prepared') and explicitly links it to handling the current detection, failing the 'without' condition.
The segment describes detection and culling actions, not general capability or preparedness.
The segment describes test results, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes contraction and culling actions, not general capability or preparedness.
The segment describes a culling action, not general capability or preparedness.
The segment describes an ongoing action ('working to depopulate'), not a general capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes pending test results, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes a price increase, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes the situation in other regions, not capability or preparedness.
